Posts.Content: I am also 61, over menopause, and curently undergoing chemotherapy(ACT). I am on the taxol now. I have experienced discomfort with sex almost from the start of chemo. I have used Replens and a lubricator, but finally just stopped trying due to the pain. Hey - there is just so pain I am willing to subject mysef to at this time. Hang in there and let me know if you discover anything helpful, please!
Posts.Title: sexual discomfort
